alert.note: Alert for Fountain; Vermillion; Warren (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 11:48PM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Fountain, Warren and north central Vermillion Counties through 1215 AM EDT... At 1145 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southeast of Rossville, or 11 miles north of Danville, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of west central Fountain, Warren and north central Vermillion Counties, including the following locations... West Lebanon, Foster, Pine Village, Tab, Rainsville, Pence and State Line City. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 3 and 6. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
